select.if: SELECT CD_DTL_NO AS TITLE_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '205' ORDER BY CD_ORDER ASC
SELECT CD_DTL_NO AS TITLE_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '211' ORDER BY CD_ORDER ASC

SELECT USR.USER_NAME AS TITLE_NM FROM T2_USERS USR INNER JOIN T2_AUTHORITIES AUTH ON USR.USER_ID = AUTH.USER_ID AND AUTH.AUTHORITY='ROLE_ADMIN' AND USR.USER_ID NOT IN ('oscAdmin', 'sungwon.yun') AND USR.USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(CD_DTL_NM, '(', 1) AS TITLE_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '207' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CD_ORDER ASC

mapper.select: SELECT USR.USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS USR INNER JOIN T2_AUTHORITIES AUTH ON USR.USER_ID = AUTH.USER_ID AND AUTH.AUTHORITY='ROLE_ADMIN' AND (USR.USER_ID IN ('oscAdmin', 'sungwon.yun') OR USR.USE_YN = 'N')

SELECT RTN.CD_DTL_NM AS DIVISION_NM , RTN.CD_ORDER AS DIVISION_ORDER
, MAX(RTN.CATEGORY#{index}) AS CATEGORY#{index}_CNT
, MAX(RTN.CATEGORY#{categorySize}) AS CATEGORY#{categorySize}_CNT
FROM (SELECT A.CD_DTL_NM , A.CD_ORDER
, IF(STAT.CD_DTL_NM IS NOT NULL AND STAT.CATEGORY IS NULL, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY#{index}
, IF(STAT.CATEGORY = #{item}, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY#{index}
, IF(
STAT.CATEGORY = #{user}
, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY#{categorySize}
FROM (SELECT CD_DTL_NM , CD_ORDER FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND USE_YN = 'Y') A
LEFT JOIN (SELECT (SELECT CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND CD_DTL_NO = IF(PM.DIVISION = '', '999', PM.DIVISION)) AS CD_DTL_NM , CASE WHEN PM.COMPLETE_YN = 'Y' AND STATUS_REQUEST_YN = 'N' THEN 'COMP' WHEN PM.DROP_YN = 'Y' AND STATUS_REQUEST_YN = 'N' THEN 'DROP' WHEN PM.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'REV' OR PM.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'REV' THEN 'REV' WHEN PM.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'REQ' OR PM.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'REQ' OR STATUS_REQUEST_YN = 'Y' THEN 'REQ' WHEN PM.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND PM.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND PM.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'DONE' THEN 'REV' WHEN PM.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND PM.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND PM.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'NA' THEN 'REV' WHEN PM.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND PM.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'NA' AND PM.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'NA' THEN 'REV' ELSE 'PROG' END CATEGORY FROM PROJECT_MASTER PM
WHERE PM.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND PM.USE_YN ='Y') STAT ON A.CD_DTL_NM = STAT.CD_DTL_NM GROUP BY A.CD_DTL_NM, STAT.CATEGORY
LEFT JOIN (SELECT (SELECT CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND CD_DTL_NO = IF(PM.DIVISION = '', '999', PM.DIVISION)) AS CD_DTL_NM , ADMIN.USER_NAME AS CATEGORY FROM PROJECT_MASTER PM
LEFT JOIN (SELECT 'unassigned' AS USER_ID, null AS USER_NAME UNION ALL SELECT USR.USER_ID , USR.USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS USR INNER JOIN T2_AUTHORITIES AUTH ON USR.USER_ID = AUTH.USER_ID AND AUTH.AUTHORITY='ROLE_ADMIN') ADMIN ON PM.REVIEWER = ADMIN.USER_ID WHERE PM.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND PM.USE_YN ='Y') STAT ON A.CD_DTL_NM = STAT.CD_DTL_NM GROUP BY A.CD_DTL_NM, STAT.CATEGORY
LEFT JOIN (SELECT (SELECT CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND CD_DTL_NO = IF(PM.DIVISION = '', '999', PM.DIVISION)) AS CD_DTL_NM , (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(CD_DTL_NM, '(', 1) AS CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '207' AND CD_DTL_NO = PM.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE) AS CATEGORY FROM PROJECT_MASTER PM
WHERE PM.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND PM.USE_YN ='Y' ) STAT ON A.CD_DTL_NM = STAT.CD_DTL_NM GROUP BY A.CD_DTL_NM, STAT.CATEGORY
LEFT JOIN (SELECT (SELECT CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND CD_DTL_NO = IF(PM.DIVISION = '', '999', PM.DIVISION)) AS CD_DTL_NM , CASE WHEN NETWORK_SERVER_TYPE = 'Y' THEN 'Network Service' ELSE 'Others' END CATEGORY FROM PROJECT_MASTER PM
WHERE PM.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND PM.USE_YN ='Y' ) STAT ON A.CD_DTL_NM = STAT.CD_DTL_NM GROUP BY A.CD_DTL_NM, STAT.CATEGORY
) RTN GROUP BY RTN.CD_DTL_NM ORDER BY RTN.CD_ORDER ASC

SELECT CONCAT(RTN.DATE, '(', #{updateType}, ')') AS COLUMN_NAME
, MAX(RTN.CATEGORY#{index}) AS CATEGORY#{index}_CNT
, MAX(RTN.CATEGORY#{categorySize}) AS CATEGORY#{categorySize}_CNT FROM (SELECT A.DATE
, IF(STAT.CATEGORY = #{item}, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY#{index}
, IF(
STAT.CATEGORY = #{user}
, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY#{categorySize} FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{startDate}, INTERVAL (@num := @num + 1)-1 MONTH), '%Y%m') AS DATE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB , (select @num := 0) NUM LIMIT #{diffMonthCnt}) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT ADMIN.USER_NAME AS CATEGORY
, CONCAT(YEAR(OM.CREATED_DATE), LPAD(MONTH(OM.CREATED_DATE), 2, '0')) AS DATE
, CONCAT(YEAR(OM.MODIFIED_DATE), LPAD(MONTH(OM.MODIFIED_DATE), 2, '0')) AS DATE
FROM OSS_MASTER OM
INNER JOIN T2_USERS T1 ON OM.MODIFIER = T1.USER_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT CD_DTL_NO , CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND USE_YN = 'Y') T2 ON T1.DIVISION = T2.CD_DTL_NO
INNER JOIN (SELECT USR.USER_ID , USR.USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS USR INNER JOIN T2_AUTHORITIES AUTH ON USR.USER_ID = AUTH.USER_ID AND AUTH.AUTHORITY='ROLE_ADMIN') ADMIN
ON OM.CREATOR = ADMIN.USER_ID AND OM.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE DATE_FORMAT(OM.CREATED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d')) STAT
ON OM.MODIFIER = ADMIN.USER_ID AND OM.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE DATE_FORMAT(OM.MODIFIED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(OM.CREATED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') != DATE_FORMAT(OM.MODIFIED_DATE, '%Y%m%d')) STAT
ON A.DATE = STAT.DATE GROUP BY A.DATE, STAT.CATEGORY ORDER BY A.DATE ASC ) RTN GROUP BY RTN.DATE

SELECT CONCAT(RTN.DATE, '(', #{updateType}, ')') AS COLUMN_NAME
, MAX(RTN.CATEGORY#{index}) AS CATEGORY#{index}_CNT
, MAX(RTN.CATEGORY#{categorySize}) AS CATEGORY#{categorySize}_CNT FROM (SELECT A.DATE
, IF(STAT.CATEGORY = #{item}, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY#{index}
, IF(
STAT.CATEGORY = #{user}
, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY#{categorySize} FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{startDate}, INTERVAL (@num := @num + 1)-1 MONTH), '%Y%m') AS DATE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB , (select @num := 0) NUM LIMIT #{diffMonthCnt}) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT ADMIN.USER_NAME AS CATEGORY
, CONCAT(YEAR(LM.CREATED_DATE), LPAD(MONTH(LM.CREATED_DATE), 2, '0')) AS DATE
, CONCAT(YEAR(LM.MODIFIED_DATE), LPAD(MONTH(LM.MODIFIED_DATE), 2, '0')) AS DATE
FROM LICENSE_MASTER LM
INNER JOIN ( SELECT OLD.LICENSE_ID FROM OSS_MASTER OM INNER JOIN OSS_LICENSE_DECLARED OLD ON OM.OSS_ID = OLD.OSS_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(OM.MODIFIED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(OM.CREATED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') != DATE_FORMAT(OM.MODIFIED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY OLD.LICENSE_ID ) OSM ON LM.LICENSE_ID = OSM.LICENSE_ID
INNER JOIN T2_USERS T1 ON LM.MODIFIER = T1.USER_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT CD_DTL_NO , CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND USE_YN = 'Y') T2 ON T1.DIVISION = T2.CD_DTL_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT USR.USER_ID , USR.USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS USR INNER JOIN T2_AUTHORITIES AUTH ON USR.USER_ID = AUTH.USER_ID AND AUTH.AUTHORITY='ROLE_ADMIN') ADMIN
ON LM.CREATOR = ADMIN.USER_ID AND LM.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE DATE_FORMAT(LM.CREATED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d')) STAT
ON LM.MODIFIER = ADMIN.USER_ID AND LM.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE DATE_FORMAT(LM.MODIFIED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(LM.CREATED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') != DATE_FORMAT(LM.MODIFIED_DATE, '%Y%m%d')) STAT
ON A.DATE = STAT.DATE GROUP BY A.DATE, STAT.CATEGORY ORDER BY A.DATE ASC ) RTN GROUP BY RTN.DATE

SELECT A.CD_DTL_NM AS DIVISION_NM , (SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM T2_USERS WHERE IF(DIVISION = '', '999', DIVISION) = A.CD_DTL_NO) AS CATEGORY0_CNT , COUNT(STAT.CNT) AS CATEGORY1_CNT FROM (SELECT CD_DTL_NO , CD_DTL_NM , CD_ORDER FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND USE_YN = 'Y') A LEFT JOIN (SELECT DIVISION.CD_DTL_NM , USR.USER_ID , CASE WHEN PM.CREATOR IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE 1 END AS CNT FROM T2_USERS USR LEFT JOIN PROJECT_MASTER PM ON USR.USER_ID = PM.CREATOR AND PM.USE_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND USE_YN = 'Y') DIVISION ON USR.DIVISION = DIVISION.CD_DTL_NO WHERE PM.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY USR.USER_ID) STAT ON A.CD_DTL_NM = STAT.CD_DTL_NM GROUP BY A.CD_DTL_NM ORDER BY A.CD_ORDER ASC
